name: 陳明彥
objective:
This course includes 4 parts: Vehicle electrical motor (DC Motor, Induction Motor, Synchronous Motor, and Motor Actuator, Control of Position, Speed, and Torque), Vehicle battery technology (battery types, electro-chemical mechanism, battery testing, alternative batteries, fuel cell, and future battery technology), Charging system (generator and charging characteristics), and Electrical energy management system.

本課程內容共分成四個部分：
1. 車用電機 (含直流馬達、感應馬達、同步馬達及其驅動器介紹，馬達位置、轉速及扭矩控制)
2. 車用電池技術 (含電池分類、電池化學、電池檢驗及測試、新式電池及燃料電池、電池發展近況)
3. 充放電系統 (發電機、充放電特性)
4. 車輛電能管理 (能量管理系統)
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to electrical systems on vehicles
Week 2: The fundamental of motors
Week 3: DC motor
Week 4: Teacher's Day vacation
Week 5: Moon festival
Week 6: Synchronous motor
Week 7: Induction motor
Week 8: Mid-term exam
Week 9: Motor control (position, speed, torque)
Week 10: Motor and electrical powertrain testing
Week 11: The history of battery technology development
Week 12: Battery chemistry, battery testing
Week 13: Alternative battery
Week 14: Fuel cell battery
Week 15: Charging technology and standards
Week 16: Electrical energy management system
Week 17: Energy management system in an EV
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
